title: Foxit PhantomPDF Business 6.2.0.0429 + Patch.REPT
description:
================
 [INFO:]
================

Foxit PhantomPDF Business 6.2.0.0429 + Patch.REPT | 339 MB

Foxit PhantomPDF - application for viewing, editing and creating PDF documents. Among the benefits of the program - small size, high speed run and create PDF-documents. Allows merging and splitting PDF-documents, delete and insert new pages, create electronic forms and notes, etc. It is possible to convert to PDF files DOC, PPT, TXT, HTML and many others. You can create PDF-documents directly from a scanner.

Program features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Faster creation of PDF document in comparison with other PDF tools
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The small size distribution and fast speed of execution
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create PDF files from any file suitable for printing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Creating a PDF document directly from the scanner
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Editing and modifying the contents of PDF files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Compare two PDF files for the differences between them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add, delete, or combine pages from multiple PDF files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Creating and populating electronic forms
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Protect PDF documents password and certificates
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adding digital signatures to PDF documents

Performance and quality
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create PDF documents three times faster!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quick Start program.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The appearance and content of the created PDF-file is fully consistent with the source materials.

Industrial quality PDF documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for more than 200 of the most common file types Office.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simultaneous work with several documents.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quick-access button on the toolbar, Microsoft Office.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for PDF / A.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to choose the specifications PDF 1.3 or 1.7 will make makes your PDF files compatible with different viewers PDF.

Redaction
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can hide the confidential information (text and images) in a document PDF, such as social security number.

Microsoft Active Directory Rights Management Service Protector and Policy Manager
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced document management capabilities through integration with Microsoft Windows Server Active Directory Rights Management.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Control access to each PDF-file distribution rights to read and modify documents.

XFA Form Filling
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for XFA (XML Forms Architecture) to fill out forms using elements XFA, that allows the use of existing forms XFA.

Advanced editing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can perform with PDF-documents many operations: change the contents of pages can select, insert, modify, delete, rotate, copy and paste text, images, graphics, add shadows.

Certification of documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You will be able to determine what changes can be applied to your document PDF.

High compression of scanned documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High compression of scanned documents will reduce the size of the resulting file and optimize the process of handling it.

OCR Text Recognition
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can convert scanned documents or ordinary PDF files into editable text files.

Rapid scan
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Streamline workflow converting paper contracts, agreements and other documents to electronic files PDF.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scan and convert in one click.

Adding header and footer in PDF files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can add page numbers, headers and footers directly to PDF-file.

Adding watermarks and backgrounds in PDF files
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can add watermarks and designations, such as "Confidential", "Draft", etc. in PDF-files.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can add background files in PDF, so your documents look professional.

Edit and modify PDF contents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly edit document content and correct errors directly in the PDF. Adding text to PDF-file as needed.

Editing documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adding comments, including notes.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Highlight, underline, and other ways of selecting text.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tools "Retry" and "Cancel."

Comparison of PDF-documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Quickly compare two documents to determine recent changes.

Organize PDF pages
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Re-organize PDF pages without resorting to the direct application of the document.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add, delete, or combine pages from multiple files PDF.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reorder PDF pages by simply dragging.

Configuring and electronic form filling
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convert your current forms into electronic PDF.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easy-to-use customization tools will make your PDF-documents more interactive. Create and manage digital signature to quickly add a signature field in the future.

Optimize PDF documents
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reduce the size of files for easy exchange and processing.

Protect PDF-documents with passwords and certificates
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Control access to PDF documents.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Protect sensitive PDF documents to prevent loss.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Enhance security when sending and receiving files PDF.

Add a digital signature to a PDF document
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adding a digital signature to PDF documents to optimize business processes.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Increased security through user authentication.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically check for unauthorized content changes.

Adding information about the document
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can add the necessary information about the document for easy archiving and retrieval.

Optional connectivity to Windows ODBC database
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can expand the configuration options through access to databases via javascript.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Developers can create scripts to connect to the database and add new data, updating information, and deleting database entries.
